attributes.action: Developers who sold freeholds prevented from obtaining planning permission
attributes.additional_details:
This petition aims to highlight prompt and motivate the builders involved in the selling of freeholds to return homeowners freeholds.
The government has agreed that new build homes sold with leasehold are not fit for purpose and is exploitive.
The Competition and Marketing Authority are investigating the mis-selling  of new leasehold homes and Leasehold reform is being undertaken by the government.
The builders responsible have not been called to account and continue to build homes.
attributes.background: Building developers involved in the scandal who sold the freeholds exploited customers to increase profit and are not fit for purpose and to build homes and communities for families

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to motivate builders to return homeowners' freeholds.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
